{"id":448553185,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1611762748,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"92 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/448553185/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Concatenation of Consecutive Binary Numbers","memory":"6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    typedef signed long long int slli;\n    int concatenatedBinary(int n) {\n        slli s = 0;\n        slli M = 1e9 + 7; \n        for (slli i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {\n            \n            s = (s << ((slli)(log2(i)) + 1)) % M;\n            // bitset<64> st(s);\n            // cout << st << endl;\n            s = (i + s) % M;\n        }\n        // bitset<64> st(s);\n        // cout << st << endl;\n        return s;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"concatenation-of-consecutive-binary-numbers"}
